meanings.definition: Showing or suggesting that future success is likely
meanings.sent1: The sunny weather on the day of the wedding was an auspicious sign for the couple's future happiness.
meanings.sent2: The team's strong start to the season was an auspicious indicator of their potential success.
meanings.sent3: Finding a four-leaf clover on the morning of the exam felt quite auspicious.
meanings.sent4: The blooming flowers in the garden painted an auspicious picture of the upcoming spring.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow after the storm was an auspicious symbol of hope and renewal.
